text: Menina Anumzana Ra Anumzamoka otinka mani fruhu kumaka'afi huhagerafi huvempage vogisine umanigahane. Hagi ana vogisia hanaveka'amofa avame'za me'ne. Ra Anumzamoka kasunku pristi vahera huzmantenka maka zupa zamaza nehuge'za zamagu'areti'ma hu'za kagri'ma kamage'ma nentaza vahe'mo'za knare kavukva zankura muse hugahaze.
